text: This park is well managed and a great place to enjoy autumn of South Korea. If you want a silence from the busy city of Seoul, this place is where you should be. Check out pork BBQ shops nearby as well.
you cannot go wrong with a trip here! if youre in s. korea, and within an hour or so drive... youll not be disappointed in any way! i would have driven 2-3 hours to see this beaute'
